snippet: Beer prices in North America may rise next year as brewers and maltsters face higher costs after cold, wet weather damaged Canadian barley crops and left farmers and tipplers crying in their beer....

headline.print_headline: Frozen Barley Crops to Push Craft Beer Prices Higher in N. America
headline.main: Frozen Barley Crops to Push Craft Beer Prices Higher in N. America

lead_paragraph: Beer prices in North America may rise next year as brewers and maltsters face higher costs after cold, wet weather damaged Canadian barley crops and left farmers and tipplers crying in their beer.
